alert.note: Alert for Dane; Dodge; Jefferson; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Rock; Walworth; Washington; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:59PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ozaukee, Milwaukee, northern Walworth, northeastern Rock, Waukesha, southern Washington, southeastern Dane, Jefferson and southeastern Dodge Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saukville to near Lac La Belle to Monona. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, Madison, Waukesha, West Allis, Wauwatosa, New Berlin, Brookfield, Greenfield, Menomonee Falls, Fitchburg, Muskego, Watertown, Mequon, Whitewater, Whitefish Bay, Greendale, Pewaukee, Stoughton, Fort Atkinson, and Brown Deer. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 258 and 273. Interstate 39/90 between mile markers 139 and 169. Interstate 94 between mile markers 246 and 310. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 6 and 40. Interstate 43 between mile markers 42 and 61, and between mile markers 73 and 99. Interstate 41 between mile markers 40 and 65. U.S. Highway 45 between mile markers 61 and 66. Interstate 41/894 between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 41/43/894 between mile markers 5 and 8. Interstate 43/94 between mile markers 311 and 314. Interstate 794 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Dane; Dodge; Jefferson; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Rock; Walworth; Washington; Waukesha
